Org UI

Basics
Components

Field Group

Basic

<div class="ouiFieldGroup">
  <label class="ouiFieldGroup__label">Address</label>
  <input type="text" class="ouiFieldGroup__component ouiInputText">
</div>

Help Text

Must be 8-100 characters long.

<div class="ouiFieldGroup">
  <label class="ouiFieldGroup__label">Address</label>
  <input type="text" class="ouiFieldGroup__child ouiInputText">
  <p class="ouiFieldGroup__helpText">Must be 8-100 characters long.</p>
</div>

Required

<div class="ouiFieldGroup isRequired">
  <label class="ouiFieldGroup__label">Address</label>
  <input type="text" class="ouiFieldGroup__child ouiInputText">
</div>

Error

Must be 8-100 characters long.

<div class="ouiFieldGroup isError">
  <label class="ouiFieldGroup__label">Address</label>
  <input type="text" class="ouiFieldGroup__child ouiInputText">
  <p class="ouiFieldGroup__helpText">Must be 8-100 characters long.</p>
</div>
